title: Error Budget Policy
summary: Managing trade-offs between reliability and feature velocity using error budgets

concepts: Burn rate alerts predict budget exhaustion
Multi-window burn rate for sensitivity tuning
Budget resets on rolling window boundary
patterns: Define graduated response based on budget remaining
100% budget consumed: Feature freeze, reliability focus
Track budget by service and team ownership

examples.multi_window: fast burn (5m) + slow burn (1h) reduces noise

antipatterns: No defined policy for budget states
Not including error budget in sprint planning
